lead_paragraph: The Finnish nordic combined skier Hannu Manninen announced his retirement from the sport. Manninen, 30, won the World Cup title from 2004-7 and recorded 45 career individual victories.
snippet: The Finnish nordic combined skier Hannu Manninen announced his retirement from the sport. Manninen, 30, won the World Cup title from 2004-7 and recorded 45 career individual victories.
